The data of the Swiss Glacier Monitoring Network (GLAMOS) are freely available (https://www.glamos.ch) and may be used with indication of the source for scientific and non-commercial use.
When using these data, please cite as:
GLAMOS (2018). Swiss Glacier Mass Balance, release 2018, Glacier Monitoring Switzerland, doi:10.18750/massbalance.2018.r2018.
These data are extracted form the above mentioned dataset (A. Michel)
